name: Hellow Gateball
overview: A little under 50 games were released for the DECO Cassette System. Some of the more popular games were also issued in dedicated cabinets and/or licensed out to other manufacturers for use in other territories. This sports game was one of them, wherein there are three numbered metal hoops or gates in a triangle and a center post called “agari,” which a player strikes last. All this must be done under the gun as a timer is running.
